headline: Co-Founder/COO at Cyble (YC W'21), Forbes Global Top 20 Cyber Startup | Ivy League MBA | Member of Forbes Business Council|Investor
summary:
Multifaceted, an executive with 15+ years of progressive international experience in finance and operations. Proven track record of managing multi-department functions to deliver exemplary results. Stellar ratings in developing and implementing financial controls and processes to support change management and improve efficiency. Worked on International assignments and possess strong knowledge of international accounting, tax, and business laws. Experienced in many aspects of capital raising at a global level.


Core Competencies: Treasury & Tax Management, Financial Planning & Reporting, Process re-
                                 engineering.

experiences.title: Investor

Santa Clara, California, United States
Raven (YC S22) is Segment for product notifications. They provide a single API to manage notifications across SMS, Email, WhatsApp, Push, Slack, Voice and more.

Web: http://ravenapp.dev/

experiences.title: Investor
experiences.description:
With Velt APIs, developers can make their apps multiplayer & collaborative, just like Figma. Today, 99% of all online tools we use are siloed & not collaborative. They are not built collaboration-first. With Velt, we will fix this. We are defining and setting standards for the future of every shared experience on the web like working together, booking trips together, watching content, shopping, playing, learning together etc. We imagine a future where you can collaborate with anyone from anywhere like they were there. Snippyly will make the world more collaborative & enable everyone to build more great things together. We’re a team of ex-Googlers. We've launched products like Augmented Reality in Google Search & Maps, Google Local Services. Come join us in this exciting journey ahead 🚀

w: velt.dev

experiences.title: Investor
experiences.description: Landeed is building India's (then for the rest of the world) fastest and most comprehensive property title search engine. More than 84% of Indian household wealth is stored in real estate, property and land. However, with 2/3rds of all court cases in India dealing with land-related disputes, it is essential that people have accessible public records to both protect themselves against litigation and provide appropriate documentation for facilitating transactions.

experiences.title: Investor
experiences.description:
Industrial B2B commerce for raw materials

Proglix is Indonesia's first B2B e-commerce that focuses to simplify the raw material procurement process. The all-in-one procurement platform for small and medium sized enterprise in the infrastructure and industrial sector.

w: proglix.com

experiences.title: Investor
experiences.description:
Marketplace for business loans that are repaid daily. 

Small shop owners earn daily unlike salaried people but when it comes to loan repayment both are asked to pay monthly. For these shop owners it is difficult to calculate how much to save daily so that they will have the required installment amount at the end of the month and also at the time of repayment they have a big hole in their working capital. Therefore, when you earn daily why not pay daily and get away from the stress of huge one-time installments. Every day a small amount of $X is deducted from your digital wallet which is on the auto-debit mandate and you don't need to worry about keeping your balance of $XXXX. You never default and also good credit scores are created.

W: DailyPe.in

recommendations:
Michel Farah



It’s rare that you come across standout talent like Manish. 
Manish expertly filled the role of  coordinator for my company’s strategic alliance with a major Indian partner.
I was particularly impressed by Manish’s ability to handle even the toughest creases in a new relationship—effortlessly. That skill often takes years to develop as a service professional, but it seemed to come perfectly naturally to him. 
Manish made sure to bridge the gap between East and West, and tried hard to explain the rules of cricket to the rest of our team.
As president of Mitchell Group Manish earns my highest recommendation.
